name: Gravity Cheese
description:
This is a 2D puzzle-platformer where the main character has to reach the goal, by switching their gravity around. 

This game was designed as part of the Game Design Course in CMGT at Saxion University. 

Art by: FlowLab & Kenney (+ some recoloring from me)

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys  - move and jump

SPACE- jump

ENTER- go to next level

How to play: Click "Run Game" and play.   It can also be played here: https://flowlab.io/game/list.
